message: I'm feeling generous, let's start with a fair deal.  Take 10% and let's see where this goes.
I'm not accepting your generous offer, I want a bigger share!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40, but if we keep going back and forth, we'll both lose money quickly!
I'm not willing to give up yet, I want a better deal. Let's try again!
This is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and get this over with. We're losing a fortune with every round!
